proposal: Diving into the world of DeFi fairness, zkMEV is reshaping the game with AI and zero-knowledge proofs for a just launchpad and trading. Congrats on reaching 167 holders on the ETH network! Imagine combining our DEX and Lottery tools with your vision, enabling your community to deploy and share revenue, all while keeping fairness at the core. Let's level the playing field together, shall we?
